item.title: Fisk's 'Mississippi River Meander' in R
item.description: Background Prep Data cleaning Explore geological ages and formations Wisconsin glaciation Context and inset map Finishing up Notes Data citation Background Those of us even mildly obsessed with maps will be familiar with Harold Fiskâ€™s 1944 series documenting the historic travel of the Mississippi River in Mississippi River Alluvial Valley. In my house in college, filled with geography majors and map enthusiasts, we had a small print hung on the wall, and it was easy to start reading it, and end up standing there, just staring, for quite a while.
